verses.roman:
mukunda kahe,--raghunandana mora 'pitā' haya
āmi tāra 'putra',--ei āmāra niścaya

synonyms: mukunda kahe—Mukunda dāsa replied; raghunandana—my son Raghunandana; mora—my; pitā—father; haya—is; āmi—I; tāra—his; putra—son; ei—this; āmāra—my; niścaya—decision.
translation: Mukunda replied,"Raghunandana is my father, and I am his son. This is my decision.
